resources.string: Turn on accessibility permissions for Dashlane

Turn on accessibility permissions in your device settings. This allows us to read your screen and make changes on all web pages.\n\nThis is only used for Autofill. We do not collect or share your data.
Dashlane In App Login is running
Dashlane may help you logging in to this app
Dashlane will use your saved information to Autofill forms and logins.
Dashlane can Autofill your saved logins on any web page.
